```{r}
data$surgeryData |>
  dplyr::select(main_procedure_code) |>
      dplyr::rename(code = main_procedure_code) |>
#  dplyr::union_all(
  dplyr::union(
    data$surgeryData |>
      dplyr::select(side_procedure_code_1) |>
      dplyr::rename(code = side_procedure_code_1)) |>
#  dplyr::union_all(
  dplyr::union(
    data$surgeryData |>
      dplyr::select(side_procedure_code_2) |>
      dplyr::rename(code = side_procedure_code_2)) |>
#  dplyr::group_by(code) |>
#  dplyr::summarise(N = dplyr::n()) |>
  dplyr::distinct() |>
  dplyr::arrange(code) |>
  dplyr::inner_join(ichi_health_interventions, dplyr::join_by(code)) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    procedure = dplyr::if_else(
      is.na(url),
      .data$intervention,
      paste0("[",.data$intervention,"](",.data$url,")")),
    .keep="unused") |>
  dplyr::rename(Code = code, Procedure = procedure) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_markdown(columns = "Procedure") |>
  gt::cols_width(`Code` ~ pct(15),`Procedure` ~ pct(85))
```
